title: Ba Bu Xiongmao
synopsis: With "Bab Panda" settled in Chengdu, the latest "Bab Panda" Sichuan Homecoming series will be launched soon. The story tells what the Babu family saw and heard after returning home. Many plots in the film are based on famous tourist attractions in Sichuan and Chengdu, such as Dujiangyan, Wolong Scenic Area, Jiuzhaigou, etc., as well as some cultural customs and arts with local characteristics, such as Chengdu teahouse customs and Chengdu sugar painting culture. , Sichuan Spicy Hot Pot, Lantern Festival... The Babu family will lead the audience to get to know Sichuan and Chengdu. "Babu Panda" will become one of the important carriers to better promote the traditional customs and tourism culture of Sichuan and Chengdu. (translated from baidu baike)
